content: कामतः, --कामेन {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} Of one's own accord, willingly. {@--2@} Voluntarily, knowingly, intentionally, wilfully; <ls>Ms. 4. 130</ls>; पदा स्पृष्टं च कामतः <ls>Y. 1. 168.</ls> {@--3@} From passion or feeling, lustfully; <ls>Ms. 3. 173.</ls> {@--4@} At will, freely, unrestrained.
